content: README.md follows a structured template: why/motivation, install quickstart, full CLI reference table, priority scale, on-disk format, JSON output examples, concurrency model, integration guide, dev commands
CHANGELOG.md uses Keep a Changelog format with [Unreleased] section at top; link refs at bottom point to GitHub compare/release URLs; initial 0.1.0 entry lists all shipped features

version-bump.ts pattern: read current version from package.json, compute next semver, write package.json first then src/index.ts with rollback if second write fails; prevents version drift between the two sources of truth
